metadata.name: HackTool - SafetyKatz Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of the hacktool SafetyKatz via PE information and default Image name

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\safetykatz.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('safetykatz.exe') AND lower(device.desc) = lower('safetykatz'))

output.summary: Detects the execution of the hacktool SafetyKatz via PE information and default Image name
